beer.description: Named after the enormous Brown Trout found in Northwest streams, this beer lives up to the legend.Â 20" Brown is medium bodied and has an extremely complex malty character.Â Using 6 varieties of Northwest grown malt, we created a masterpiece of color, aroma and flavor.Â Set your hook in one of these and you won't be disappointed!
